text: (bright music)

- [Narrator] 24 circuits
across 21 countries.
20 drivers all out on track
chasing one dream.
(upbeat music)

Formula 1 brings the action to
millions of passionate fans,

telling authentic and
engaging stories that unfold
on the circuit through global production.
AWS partners with Formula 1
to drive technical innovations all the way

from preseason testing to
the final race in Abu Dhabi.
Just like drivers and their teams,
the F1 production broadcast team
makes split second decisions
across various data sources
to ensure fans around the world
don't miss a moment of the action.
Real-time access to data is everything.
With up to 300 sensors on every car,
over 1.1 million telemetry data points
are generated every second.

Together, AWS and F1 have
developed Track Pulse,

a single view making it easy
for the live production team
to identify every story as it unfolds.

Track Pulse combines real-time
action with historical data

to deliver engaging insights
to the fans at race pace.
Track Pulse, powered by AWS.
